name: Paradise Quest HD
description:
Check out our latest Hidden Object Adventure game, "Classic Adventures: The Great Gatsby" at https://itunes.apple.com/app/classic-adventures-great-gatsby/id578960905

The revolutionary Match-3 puzzle adventure finally comes in a dazzling HD version for iPad!

-- ENHANCED HD GAMEPLAY! -- Paradise Quest HD for iPad combines the gorgeous graphics of the PC game with the intuitive touchscreen controls the iPhone version, offering the most fun and addictive puzzle experience on iPad!

-- A PUZZLE WITH A REVOLUTIONARY TWIST! --
An exciting take on the ever-popular Match-3 puzzle genre: each match you make moves you smoothly across the puzzle board. Explore the map to find special items and complete your mission through 60 addicting levels!

-- AN EXCITING TROPICAL ADVENTURE --
Play as renowned ecologist Dr Evan Finch to restore the majestic island of Isabela to its former beauty. Collect natural resources to revive lush vegetation, restore a mighty animal kingdom, and uncover the ancient artifacts of a lost Galapagos civilization.

-- TOP-NOTCH PRODUCTION VALUES --
Marvel at the lush beauty of tropical environments and wonderful creatures of the Galapagos. Enjoy brilliantly colorful graphics, enchanting sound effects and dazzling animations!

-- CHALLENGE FRIENDS! -- Connected multiplayer mode lets users challenge their friends by playing iPad vs. iPad or iPad vs iPhone/iPod.

--THE QUEST CONTINUES!-- Unlock the Paradise Nights Extra Levels Pack to play 20 new addicting levels. The fun never stops!
